root.name: strokeWeight()

example.code: strokeWeight(1) # Default line(20, 20, 80, 20) strokeWeight(4) # Thicker line(20, 40, 80, 40) strokeWeight(10) # Beastly line(20, 70, 80, 70)

root.description: Sets the width of the stroke used for lines, points, and the border around shapes. All widths are set in units of pixels.
